title: Kindness on the Street
plot_summary: A boy notices an old man struggling to cross the street and decides to help. The old man thanks him, and the moment reminds the boy that kindness creates real impact.
moral_lesson: Small acts of kindness can make a big difference in someone else's day.

segments.script_text: The boy notices the old man and quickly offers help.
They cross safely, and the old man thanks him warmly.
The boy reflects that even small kindness matters.
